reviewtext: I use this card with a Canon G1 camera.  Haven't had a single problem.  Stores 50 or so raw images.  Downloads are fast and haven't had a single reliability issue.  I like compactflash cards as they are much more sturdier and Viking Components did well on this one.I recommend this card for anyone who has a digital comera that takes compactflash cards
summary: have had this card for 2+ yrs now and no problems
